name: Don't Trust Henry Flash prototype
description:
Henry is a bacterial organism...he tries to steal your brain to feed his welps. Dont trust him, you fool!

Its still a Prototype but for the mobiloe version it is getting a lot of new features.

You can also visit my Dev-blog! So feel free to drop me a line. =D
http://donttrusthenry.de/

Cheers Lewnatic.
